titleStmt.title: A declaration and an information from us the people of God called Quakers to the present governours, the King and both Houses of Parliament, and all whom it may concern / M.F.
titleStmt.author: Fox, Margaret Askew Fell, 1614-1702.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Thomas Simmons and Robert Wilson,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntingon Library.
Attributed to Margaret Fox. cf. NUC pre-1956.
